p: Male Wistar rats (150–230 g) were used for the acute dermal irritation/corrosion assay and nulliparous female Swiss albino mice (18 g – 26 g) were used for the acute toxicity assay. The animals were obtained from the KEMRI animal house and were kept under standard room conditions. Pelleted feed (Unga Mice Pencils, Unga Feeds Ltd) and water was made available ad libitum . Principles of humane laboratory animal care and use were observed according to the Animal Care and Use Committee (ACUC).
